nodes.text: Baron Administrator was the title of whoever was in charge of Cloud City on Bespin and other comparable facilities. By 3 ABY, Cloud City's Baron Administrator was Lando Calrissian, who had won the title and position from his predecessor, Dominic Raynor, in a game of sabacc.
This title was later used by Daran Tal when he came into control of the Crystal Web Station, and was further implemented for the ruler of the platform city of Cularin.
The post of Baron Administrator was symbolized by a belt with a distinctive buckle design. An Aeien silk cape was also often used as a symbol of the office.
